blur_detection.description: The receipt text is clear and sharp with well-defined edges and minimal blur.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the image has excellent focus quality.

contrast_assessment.description: The black text on white paper provides excellent contrast for optimal readability.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed for contrast quality.

glare_identification.description: Minor glare is present in some areas of the receipt but does not significantly impact text readability.
glare_identification.recommendation: When capturing receipts, use diffused lighting to minimize glare spots.

water_stains.description: No water stains, discoloration, or water damage detected on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue keeping receipts dry and protected from moisture.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt shows some minor creasing but all text remains clearly visible and undistorted.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Consider using a receipt scanner app that can digitally flatten minor creases.

cut_off_detection.description: The receipt is fully captured with all edges visible and no content cut off.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Continue capturing the full receipt in frame as in this example.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with all standard sections including header, line items, and totals.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as all receipt sections are present.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other obstructions are blocking any part of the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: Continue capturing receipts without obstructions as demonstrated.
